data.field: rand - retrieve the next pseudorandom number

Returns a random fractional number greater than or equal to 0 and less than the value of EXPR. (EXPR should be positive.) If EXPR is omitted, the value 1 is used. Automatically calls [perlfunc:srand|srand()] unless [perlfunc:srand|srand()] has already been called. See also [perlfunc:srand|srand()].

(Note: If your rand function consistently returns numbers that are too large or too small, then your version of Perl was probably compiled with the wrong number of RANDBITS.)
